review: The Doctor was very courteous and understood the problem well did detailed examination and gave positive assurance.

review: My Father have enlarged prostate and urethral stricture.We went to Mehta's hospital for urethral dilation.We are very happy with the treatments Dr.Ilamparuthi gave to my father . ** ** **** ** ** *** ** *** **** ********* ** ******
It was good experience only thing is my place is far away from his hospital. He listened my words carefully and asked me to take few test and return back.
